result.markdown: --- title: "Metaanalysis-website" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ``` glossary_add(term = "power", def = "The probability of rejecting the null hypothesis when it is false, for a specific analysis, effect size, sample size, and criteria for significance.") ``` # Overview This is an overview hello power # The effect of educational mobile games on learning performance: a meta-analysis and research synthesis https://www.clearinghouse.edu.tum.de/spielbasiertes-lernen/spielbasiertes-lernen-und-motivation/ our article was published in the journal [Interactive Learning Environments](https://www.tandfonline.com/journals/nile20?utm_medium=affiliate&utm_campaign=S7721946419_EMENAC_NILE&utm_source=researchgate.net) *Interactive Learning Environments* is a well-regarded international peer-reviewed journal focused on educational technology and learning sciences. It is published by Taylor & Francis and covers a broad spectrum of topics such as interactive learning systems, online education, virtual classrooms, and instructional design.
